name: wooden sign
desc: A small wooden sign hanging on the wall.
long_desc:
----------------------------Helpful Commands----------------------------Type <help> for a list of commands.----------------------------------
 move <direction : Type move e to move your character east.--------------Type <look> to see the current room.----------------------------------Type <look> *direction* to look at a room in that direction.---------Type <look> *npc or item* to look at an item or npc inside the room.
